title: Pricing Plans
description: Choose the right plan to boost your social media presence
readyToStart: Ready to Boost Your Social Media Presence?
getStarted: Get started today with our proven strategies to increase engagement and reach.

boostPosts.title: Boost Every Single of Your Posts!
boostPosts.description: Automatically detect all of your new posts and immediately boost them to maximize their visibility and reach, ensuring they gain traction quickly and effectively.

searchInteract.title: Search For and Interact with Relevant Posts
searchInteract.description: Every day, we proactively search for and interact with relevant POSTS users and projects, strategically promoting your project through targeted comments. This approach helps us reach new audiences who may not yet be familiar with your brand.

fullSupport.title: Full Support
fullSupport.description: We provide comprehensive support by setting up a dedicated Telegram (or other) group where we can collaborate, exchange insights, and stay up-to-date on the progress of your profile's promotion in real-time.

essentials.name: Essentials Plan
features: Interactions with every post (comments, likes, requotes) - 200+/post
Search for and comment on external posts - 50+/day
Boost our comments (replies, likes, etc.) to increase reach
Access to a dedicated support channel (Telegram)

professional.name: Professional Plan
features: Interactions with every post (comments, likes, requotes) - 500+/post
Search for and comment on external posts - 125+/day
Boost our comments (replies, likes, etc.) to increase reach
Access to a dedicated support channel (Telegram)

benefits.title: How We Boost Your Social Media Presence

items.title: Your Project's Profile
items.description: We automatically detect all of your new posts and immediately boost them to maximize their visibility and reach, ensuring they gain traction quickly and effectively.

items.title: Full support for every post
items.description: Each post is carefully supported by automatic likes, reposts, comments, and bookmarks, amplifying engagement and driving continuous interaction across the platform.

items.title: We know where your audience is
items.description: Our services go beyond just your posts; we proactively search for relevant content within your project's niche and engage with those posts to broaden your influence and connect with a wider audience.

items.title: Organic growth, full security
items.description: Through our consistent efforts, your project will experience steady, organic growth, allowing it to expand naturally and reach new heights each day.

twitterSection.title: THE MOST EFFECTIVE PROMOTION FOR YOUR CRYPTO PROJECT ON
twitterSection.description1: We provide advanced, fully automated solutions for boosting your Twitter posts, designed to significantly enhance engagement and visibility. We use advanced AI, and all activities are highly natural and safe.
twitterSection.description2: All of our accounts on X (over 2,000) have been established for many years, with some dating back to 2009. Unlike many other services that rely on new or low-quality accounts, we utilize seasoned profiles, making our actions highly effective while minimizing the risk of bans or detection, ensuring the safety of your brand.
